name.ja: ギャラクティカ・デジャヴュ

requirement.en: If your opponent's LP are 4000 or higher, send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Level 4 or lower LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type Normal Monster to the Graveyard by this effect, you can Special Summon that monster face-up to your field. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the original ATK of the monster Special Summoned by this effect].
